ORIGAM Documentation : iif

Created by Petr Hrehorovský, last modified by Tomáš Vavrda on Feb 02, 2016

Inline if conditional statement.

Namespace

xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions"

Syntaxe

string iif(object condition, string trueResult, string falseResult)

Parameters

conditionSupported value types are boolean and string. In case of string supported values are: "true", "false", "0", "1", "".
trueResultValue returned if condition is valuated as true.
falseResultValue returned if condition is valuated as false.
